sentences.en: an honorarium given in consideration of her contributions to the project.
sentences.cn: 为她在这项工程中作出的贡献而颁发给她的酬金

sentences.en: Careful consideration should be given to issues of health and safety.
sentences.cn: 健康与安全的问题应该认真予以考虑。

sentences.en: Here, I'd like to put up an idea for your consideration.
sentences.cn: 我想在这儿提个意见供你考虑.

sentences.en: John never showed any consideration for his mother's feeling.
sentences.cn: 约翰从来都不体谅他母亲的感情.

sentences.en: Peter was severely lectured for lack of consideration to his mother.
sentences.cn: 彼得因毫不体贴母亲而受到严厉训斥.

sentences.en: Political rather than economic considerations influenced the location of the new factory.
sentences.cn: 影响新工厂选址的是政治因素，而不是经济因素。

sentences.en: proposals put forward for consideration
sentences.cn: 提请考虑的建议

sentences.en: Really, her tone said, some people have absolutely no consideration.
sentences.cn: 她的语气的确是在说有些人从不替他人考虑。

sentences.en: Several proposals are under consideration by the state assembly.
sentences.cn: 有几个提案州议会正在讨论中。

sentences.en: She can hear the old woman muttering about consideration.
sentences.cn: 她能听到那个老妇人小声咕哝说考虑考虑。

sentences.en: Show consideration for other rail travellers.
sentences.cn: 体谅其他铁路乘客。

sentences.en: Show consideration for your neighbours.
sentences.cn: 要表示出对邻居们的体贴。

sentences.en: That is just a secondary consideration .
sentences.cn: 那只不过是次要的因素。

sentences.en: the abolition of the House of Lords was under consideration.
sentences.cn: 废除贵族院一事正在研究中。

sentences.en: The Board is scrupulous in its consideration of all applications for licences.
sentences.cn: 委员会对所有申请许可证的人予以审慎考虑。

sentences.en: The district is under consideration for designation as a conservation area.
sentences.cn: 正在考虑将这个地区指定为保护区。

sentences.en: The proposal requires careful examination and consideration.
sentences.cn: 那项提议需要经过仔细研究和考虑。

sentences.en: Their prime consideration has been not to overheat the economy.
sentences.cn: 他们首要考虑的是防止经济发展过快。

sentences.en: They’ve got no consideration for others.
sentences.cn: 他们一点都不为别人着想。

sentences.en: to treat sb with kindness and consideration
sentences.cn: 待人体贴周到

sentences.en: turned back in consideration of the worsening weather.
sentences.cn: 考虑到正在恶化的天气而返回

sentences.en: We did an overall consideration of the matter at last.
sentences.cn: 最后我们又对这个问题作了全盘考虑.

words.tran_cn: 相当大的；重要的，值得考虑的
经过深思熟虑的；被尊重的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 与受益价值相等的回报

trans.tran_cn: 仔细考虑，讨论，体贴，应考虑的因素，报酬
trans.tran_en: careful thought and attention, especially before making an official or important decision
